name: Tether (itch) (sonelliot)
description:
You control one of the fundamental forces of the world that joins objects together - Magnetism. Use your powers to progress through the dungeon!

This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam! The theme was "Joined Together".

You control a little gnome wizard who has the ability to magnetise and de-magnetise metal objects at will to bring them together. 

You need to employ this power to both traverse the levels and keep yourself safe from the wandering souls.

CONTROLS

Mouse and Keyboard:

Move - WASD

Jump - Space

Toggle Tether Mode - Shift

Choose Tether Object - Left Click

Cancel Current Tether - Right Click

Gamepad:

Move - Left Stick

Jump - South Button / (Xbox) A

Toggle Tether Mode - East Button / (Xbox) B

Move Tether Reticle - Right Stick

Choose Tether Object - Right Shoulder

Cancel Current Tether - Left Shoulder

CREDITS

Elliot - Design / Programming

Matthew - Art / Design

Peter - Programming / Art
